templatemaui
Table of Contents

Class SegmentedControl

Namespace
TemplateMAUI.Controls
Assembly
TemplateMAUI.dll

The SegmentedControl is a custom templated control that provides a segmented control interface, allowing users to select from multiple segments or options. It is useful for scenarios where a single choice needs to be made from a set of options.

[ContentProperty("SegmentedItems")]
public class SegmentedControl : TemplatedView, INotifyPropertyChanged, IEffectControlProvider, IToolTipElement, IContextFlyoutElement, IAnimatable, IViewController, IVisualElementController, IElementController, IGestureController, IGestureRecognizers, IPropertyMapperView, IHotReloadableView, IReplaceableView, ILayout, ILayoutController, IVisualTreeElement, IContentView, IView, IElement, ITransform, IPadding, ICrossPlatformLayout
